meanings.definition: A room or building where goods are manufactured or repaired.
meanings.sent1: In the workshops, the workers fix broken machines.
meanings.sent2: The workshops are busy with people making furniture.
meanings.sent3: The workshops were so full of tools, it looked like a hardware store!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a workshop of ideas, constantly creating new inventions.
meanings.sent5: The workshops hummed with the sound of machines, creating a lively atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A meeting at which a group of people engage in intensive discussion and activity on a particular subject or project.
meanings.sent1: During the workshops, everyone shared their ideas for the project.
meanings.sent2: The workshops lasted all day as the team brainstormed solutions.
meanings.sent3: The workshops turned into a friendly competition of who could come up with the best idea.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a workshop of ideas, constantly creating new inventions.
meanings.sent5: The workshops buzzed with energy as everyone collaborated on the task at hand.
